About the work from home job/internship
Are you a driven and passionate individual looking to kickstart your career in Machine Learning? Join Optimasys as a Machine Learning intern and take on exciting projects that will challenge and enhance your skills. We are seeking a talented individual with expertise in Python, R Programming, Data Analytics, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Deep Learning, and Artificial Intelligence. As an intern, you will have the opportunity to work alongside experienced professionals and contribute to cutting-edge projects that drive innovation and success.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Develop and implement machine learning algorithms to analyze and interpret complex data sets.
2. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify business opportunities and provide data-driven insights.
3. Conduct research on the latest trends and advancements in machine learning and artificial intelligence.
4. Utilize programming skills to clean, preprocess, and manipulate data for model training.
5. Build and test machine learning models to optimize performance and accuracy.
6. Present findings and recommendations to stakeholders in a clear and concise manner.
7. Continuously learn and grow in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.

If you are eager to learn, innovate, and make a real impact, apply now and take the first step towards a rewarding career in Machine Learning at Optimasys.
Skill(s) required
Artificial intelligence
Data Analytics
Data Science
Deep Learning
Machine Learning
Natural Language Processing (NLP)
Python
R Programming
Earn certifications in these skills
Learn Artificial intelligence
Learn Data Analytics
Learn Data Science
Learn Deep Learning
Learn Machine Learning
Learn NLP
Learn Python
Who can apply

Only those candidates can apply who:

1. are available for the work from home job/internship

2. can start the work from home job/internship between 28th Oct'25 and 2nd Dec'25

3. are available for duration of 3 months

4. have relevant skills and interests

* Women wanting to start/restart their career can also apply.

Perks
Certificate
Letter of recommendation
Flexible work hours
5 days a week
